original_text: The wild beasts of the desert shall also meet with the wild beasts of the island, and the satyr shall cry to his fellow; the screech owl also shall rest there, and find for herself a place of rest.
korean_text: 들짐승이 이리와 만나며 숫염소가 그 동류를 부르며 올빼미가 거기에 살면서 쉬는 처소로 삼으며

sentences.original_text: The wild beasts of the desert
shall also meet with the wild beasts of the island
and the satyr shall cry to his fellow
the screech owl also shall rest there
and find for herself a place of rest
